entry.title: WIND WARNING , Stephenville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:36 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Stephenville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:45 PM NST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, -0.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stephenville Airport 04:32 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: -0.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -4.3°C
Wind: E 58 km/h gust 73 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Rain or freezing rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Snow changing through ice pellets and freezing rain to rain this morning. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 except gusting to 140 along parts of the coast this morning and early this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High 6. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Flurries beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
